input: The National Human Rights Commission can: P. Enquire only on the presentation of a petition of the victim and not suo moto, into the complaint of violation of human rights. Q. Not intervene in any proceeding involving violation of human rights pending before a court. Which of the statements given above is/are correct?
explanation: The commission can inquire suo moto or on a petition presented to it by victim or any person on his behalf or on a direction into complaint of violation of human rights.
